section.title: Pre-Install Requirements and Prerequisites
section.para: Ensure that the following requirements have been met before continuing with the install.

varlistentry.term: Anything Eclipse 3.x Itself Will Run On

listitem.para: The &THIS.PLATFORM; EclipSLEE plugin will run inside Eclipse, having the same requirements.
A working installation of the Java Development Kit (JDK) version 5 or higher is required in order to run the &THIS.PLATFORM; EclipSLEE Plugin.
For instructions on how to install the JDK, refer to .
A working installation of the Eclipse platform version 3.7 (Indigo) or higher is required in order to run the &THIS.PLATFORM; EclipSLEE plugin.
For instructions on how to install Eclipse, refer to Where do I get and install Eclipse?.
For performing maven actions, an installation of the Maven Integration for Eclipse plugin (m2e) version 1.0.0 or higher is required by the &THIS.PLATFORM; EclipSLEE plugin.
For instructions on how to install m2e, refer to Installing m2e.
The plugin can be easily installed and updated by using the Restcomm EclipSLEE Update Site.
As an alternative to the update site, it is possible to download the plugin and install it manually.

section.title: Update Site
section.para: Set up the Update Site following these steps:

procedure.step: Click Add... and enter name EclipSLEE and URL http://mobicents.googlecode.com/svn/downloads/eclipse-update-site/
Select the appropriate EclipSLEE version, click Next and follow the instructions in the Eclipse Wizard
Download the latest EclipSLEE JAR file from here
Copy the JAR file to ECLIPSE_HOME/plugins

section.title: Nightly Builds Update Site
section.para: We provide nightly builds for the early adopters. Set up the Update Site following these steps:

procedure.step: Click Add... and enter name EclipSLEE and URL https://mobicents.ci.cloudbees.com/job/Restcomm-EclipSLEE-release/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/
Select the appropriate EclipSLEE version, click Next and follow the instructions in the Eclipse Wizard
Locate EclipSLEE plugin and click Uninstall
